description: Number of unlabeled Hamiltonian circuits on n-octahedron (cross polytope).
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: S. Jablan, R. Sazdanovic, Knots, Links, and Self-avoiding curves, Forma 22 (1) (2007) 5-13. In the denominator on page 8, n-k should read 2n-k.
D. Singmaster, Hamiltonian circuits on the n-dimensional octahedron, J. Combinatorial Theory Ser. B 19 (1975), no. 1, 1-4.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
